All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BadIsbn10Exception
Exception class for Invalid ISBN of 10 digits cases
BadIsbn13Exception
Exception class for Invalid ISBN of 13 digits cases
BadPriceException
Exception class for invalid price cases
BadYearException
Exception class for invalid year cases
Book
Represent book in records Book can have 6 attributes : Title, Author, Price, ISBN, Genre and Year
Driver
Driver Class to run all the coded methods and function the program.
Menu
Menu class contains all the methods needed for formating the display of the book records.
MissingFieldException
Exception class for missing field in record
Record
Represent record in the file Has multiple methods to fetch and validate data out if record.
TooFewFieldsException
Exception class for less field than 6 in record
TooManyFieldsException
Exception class for more field than 6 in record
UnknownGenreException
Exception class for unknown genre in record
